release.action: Operations now support multiple inputs and multiple outputs where each input or output structure maps to a different JAXB object and also to a CICS Container.
Generated endpoints now use a new XML configuration file. It is called legstar-invoker-config.xml and should be accessible from the classpath (for instance stored in shared/lib).
Generated endpoints are protocol agnostic. You can switch from http to socket and have both direct or pooled sessions to CICS by changing the XML configuration file.
The Hostconnection.properties file no longer exist. It is not referenced from the generated endpoints anymore (content is replaced by XML configuration file).
